import HeroImage from '../../assets/Intercom.jpeg'; import { Popover } from '@headlessui/react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Fade from 'react-reveal/Fade'; const HeroSection = () => { return ( <>

Intercom Staffing{' '} Agency

Intercom is a national employment agency focused on compliance-oriented staffing. We offer temp staffing, direct hire, independent consultants, and third-party staffing options. Our clients benefit from big solutions that attract & retain employees, contractors, and part-time workers, all while increasingÂ profit.

Lets Talk!
How we can Help?
) } export default HeroSection;
